mods.abstract: Performance of The Winner, written by Shel Silverstein, produced by Bill Rice and Bobby Bare, recorded in April 1976 at RCA Victor Studio in Nashville, Tenn., and performed by Bobby Bare (vocals), Dave Kirby (guitar), John Christopher (guitar), Red Lane (guitar), Buddy Emmons (steel/dobro), Henry Strzelecki (bass), Ted Reynolds (bass), Jerry Carrigan (drums), Larrie Londin (drums), and Bobby Wood (piano). Most likely commercial recording (RCA Victor PB-10556 and RCA Victor APL1-1786).

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
